articles.title: Jury orders Tesla to pay more than $240 million in Autopilot crash case - AP News
articles.description: A Miami jury decided that Elon Musk’s car company Tesla was partly responsible for a deadly crash in Florida involving its Autopilot driver assist technology and must pay the victims more than $240 million in damages. The federal jury held that Tesla bore sig…

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Under RFK Jr, CDC skips study on vaccination rates, quietly posts data on drop - Ars Technica
articles.description: Vaccination rates fell once again as nonmedical exemptions hit a new high.
